card.name: Mirin, Held by the Heavens
card.text: Flying When Mirin, Held by the Heavens dies, if your life total is less than 10, it becomes 10.

card.name: Centered Acolyte
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, if it isn't your main phase, create a 1/1 white Monk creature token, then creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Syrina, the Dragon Queen
card.text: Flying When Syrina, the Dragon Queen enters, gain control of target nonland permanent for as long as you control Syrina, the Dragon Queen. {2}{U}: Exile Syrina, the Dragon Queen. Return her to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Hat Trick
card.text: You may activate loyalty abilities of target planeswalker you control an additional time this turn. Fabled {1}{U}{U} (Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that planeswalker.) --- (Back): Okus Pokus

card.name: Okus Pokus
card.text: Enchant planeswalker Enchanted planeswalker has "[+2]: Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library." --- (Front): Hat Trick

card.name: Saffrisa, Heir Apparent
card.text: Deathtouch Instant and sorcery spells you control have deathtouch. {2}{B}: Exile target creature card from an opponent's graveyard, then create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token and put a +1/+1 counter on Saffrisa, Heir Apparent.

card.name: Ravaging Tyrant
card.text: Whenever Ravaging Tyrant enters or attacks, each opponent loses 3 life, discards a card, and sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Dragon Queen's Disciple
card.text: Haste Dominance — {T}: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. Activate only if you control the creature with the greatest power or tied for the greatest power.

card.name: Unburdened Rage
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices half the permanents they control, rounded down.

card.name: Imperial Chimera
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 2. Reveal the top card of your library: If a creature card with flying was revealed this way, Imperial Chimera gains flying until end of turn. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Highlands Champion
card.text: Flash If a spell or ability an opponent controls would cause you to discard a creature card, you may put that card onto the battlefield instead.

card.name: Hemley Eggfeather
card.text: Tap target nonland permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Put target permanent into its owner's library second from the top. Shuffle up to X cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards. You gain that much life.

card.name: Lumbering Egil
card.text: Search target opponent's library for a creature or planeswalker card and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Light a Fire
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+X and gains trample until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control. Fabled {4}{R}{G} (Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that creature.) --- (Back): Brimr, Forged in the Flames

card.name: Brimr, Forged in the Flames
card.text: Equipped creature has indestructible as long as it's your turn. Whenever equipped creature attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. Equip {6} --- (Front): Light a Fire

card.name: Redtail Fencer
card.text: First strike Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Virtuous Angel
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

card.name: Culi-Sae Exonerator
card.text: Double strike {3}{W}: Arm target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery. (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {2}, then attach it to that creature.)

card.name: Issbarren Warden
card.text: Flash When Issbarren Warden enters, exile target token.

card.name: Crippling Apparition
card.text: Flying Whenever an embattled creature you control attacks, tap target creature defending player controls. (A creature is embattled if it has a counter on it or has a permanent you control attached to it.)

card.name: Bjarndyr Sergeant
card.text: Lifelink Whenever Bjarndyr Sergeant attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Fiery Reckoning
card.text: Target opponent chooses up to one creature. Destroy the rest.

card.name: Warring Ways
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn. Fabled {3}{W}{W} (Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that creature.) --- (Back): Glory Days

card.name: Glory Days
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game." --- (Front): Warring Ways

card.name: Equanimity
card.text: Enchant creature As Equanimity enters, choose a card type. When Equanimity enters, draw a card. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen card type. This effect doesn't remove Equanimity. (This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with that card type.)

card.name: Cane Dancer
card.text: Flash When Cane Dancer enters, you may cast target blue instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Gale Murmurer
card.text: Flying If a triggered ability of another permanent you control would trigger for the first time each turn, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Shipway Whale
card.text: {8}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 5. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put five +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Shipway Whale becomes monstrous, target player exiles all cards in their library, then shuffles their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Syrina's Brood
card.text: Flying When Syrina's Brood enters, look at the top six cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Seismic Passage
card.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. You may put a permanent card that shares a card type with it from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Treacherous Conditions
card.text: Choose one — • Return target creature to its owner's hand unless that player pays {1}. • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Invocation Circle
card.text: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal two instant and/or sorcery cards. Exile those cards, then that player shuffles the rest into their library. You may cast cards exiled this way until end of turn, and you may cast them without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Cryptic Ritual
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent may have you put those cards into your hand. Otherwise, put those cards into your graveyard, then draw three cards.

card.name: Model of Perfection
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. Fabled {5}{U}{U} (Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that creature.) --- (Back): Ship of Fools

card.name: Ship of Fools
card.text: Enchant creature you control At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted creature. --- (Front): Model of Perfection

card.name: Departed Evangel
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 1 life. Departed Evangel can't block. You may cast Departed Evangel from your graveyard if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Flailing Terror
card.text: Sacrifice two other creatures: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Flailing Terror becomes monstrous, target opponent sacrifices two creatures.

card.name: Astrid, Disgruntled Princess
card.text: When Astrid, Disgruntled Princess enters, destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of Warriors you control.

card.name: Skhorvall Behemoth
card.text: Menace Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Skhorvall Behemoth gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Withered Elk
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Withered Elk deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded down.

card.name: Spirits of the Shrine
card.text: Flying, lifelink Skip your draw step. Pay 3 life: Draw three cards. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

card.name: Fateful Journey
card.text: Search your library for a card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Rend Asunder
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. You gain 1 life and that permanent's controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Tear Loose
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Fabled {2}{B} (Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that creature.) --- (Back): Heartstrings

card.name: Heartstrings
card.text: Enchant creature When Heartstrings leaves the battlefield, exile enchanted creature. Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, exile it at end of combat. --- (Front): Tear Loose

card.name: Cogent Recruiter
card.text: Dominance — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control the creature with the greatest power or tied for the greatest power, you may pay {R}. If you do, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Byway Bruiser
card.text: Whenever Byway Bruiser enters or leaves the battlefield, you may have it deal 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Warfury Dragon
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Warfury Dragon becomes enchanted or equipped, monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Rakkiri Dissident
card.text: Haste Whenever a player casts a spell, Rakkiri Dissident deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Viork Woods Savage
card.text: Menace Whenever a player gains life, that player sacrifices a permanent.

card.name: Twilight Delirium
card.text: Exchange control of all creatures you and target player control until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Play the Coward
card.text: Return target blocking creature to its owner's hand. Creatures blocked by that creature get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Casualty of War
card.text: Casualty of War deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. {2}{R}{R}, Exile Casualty of War from your graveyard: Arm up to two target creatures you control. Activate only as a sorcery. (Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0" and equip {2}, then attach it to that creature.)

card.text: Nonbasic lands target player controls don't untap during that player's next untap step. Fabled {3}{R} (Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that player.) --- (Back): Scarlet Haze

card.text: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player taps a nonbasic land they control, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. --- (Front): Starlit Raze

card.text: {4}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Grizzly Matriarch becomes monstrous, destroy target noncreature permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Sentinel of the Highlands
